author: rhill
title: Emmerdale spoilers: Laurel Thomas kisses ex Marlon after husband Ashley forgets she has ever existed
text:
Emmerdale spoilers: Laurel Thomas kisses ex Marlon after husband Ashley forgets she has ever existed 
Laurel seeks comfort in her ex after visiting the care home By ROSE HILL Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments EMMERDALE’s dementia storyline will take a heartbreaking turn as Ashley Thomas forgets that his wife Laurel ever existed, prompting her to kiss ex Marlon. 
Laurel initially turns to Marlon after feeling apprehensive about her visit to the care home. 1 Laurel and Carly later have a heart-to-heart about what happened 
She is left devastated when she watches Ashley’s interest in his new friend Maggie and appears to have forgotten her. 
Laurel returns home and when Marlon calls in and tries to lift her spirits, he puts a comforting arm around her. 
She impulsively kisses him just as Sandy walks in and is upset at the sight. 
Emmerdale's Robert and Aaron's most dramatic moments revealed as they finally get married SOAP LIFE Emmerdale's bad boy Danny Miller says he 'understands' why Danny Dyer needs a break from EastEnders 'I'VE BEEN WAITING YEARS' Emmerdale star hints that Robert Sugden will take Aaron Dingle's surname after wedding 'TRYING TO START A RIOT?' Emmerdale infuriates fans by hinting that Rebecca will contest Robert and Aaron's wedding WOOLPACK WEDDING When is Emmerdale's Robron wedding between Aaron Dingle and Robert Sugden and who are Danny Miller and Ryan Hawley? ANOTHER INCEST ROMP? Emmerdale suggests that passionate affair between Pete and his aunt Moira isn't over 'HE'S A HUGE CHARACTER' Will Andy Sugden return to Emmerdale? Bosses tease comeback for the soap favourite 

Later, Marlon confesses to his girlfriend Carly that he had kissed Laurel. 
Sandy also goes to visit Ashley in the care home – will he and Laurel be able to rebuild bridges? 
Laurel and Carly later have a heart-to-heart and Carly makes her decision about moving in with Marlon. Emmerdale's Ashley Thomas forgets wife Laurel in moving episode Emmerdale airs weeknights on ITV at 7pm
